verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH935>, When I bring the sword <WH2719> upon a land <WH776>, and the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> take <WH3947> a <WH259> man <WH376> from among <WH7097> them <WH5414>, and set him for their watchman <WH6822>;
if <WH7200>, when he seeth the sword <WH2719> come <WH935> upon the land <WH776>, he blow <WH8628> the trumpet <WH7782>, and warn <WH2094> the people <WH5971>;

then whosoever <WH8085> heareth <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, and taketh not warning <WH2094>, if the sword <WH2719> come <WH935>, and take him away <WH3947>, his blood <WH1818> shall be upon his own head <WH7218>.

He heard <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, and took not warning <WH2094>; his blood <WH1818> shall be upon him <WH2094>; whereas if he had taken warning, he would have delivered <WH4422> his soul <WH5315>.

But if the watchman <WH6822> see <WH7200> the sword <WH2719> come <WH935>, and blow <WH8628> not the trumpet <WH7782>, and the people <WH5971> be not warned <WH2094>, and the sword <WH2719> come <WH935>, and take <WH3947> any person <WH5315> from among them <WH3947>; he is taken away in his iniquity <WH5771>, but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1875> at the watchman <WH6822>'s hand <WH3027>.

So thou <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, I have set <WH5414> thee a watchman <WH6822> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>; therefore hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> at my mouth <WH6310>, and give them warning from me <WH2094>.

When I say <WH559> unto the wicked <WH7563>, O wicked <WH7563> man <WH4191>, thou shalt surely die <WH4191>, and thou dost not speak <WH1696> to warn <WH2094> the wicked <WH7563> from his way <WH1870>; that wicked <WH7563> man shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity <WH5771>, but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at thy hand <WH3027>.

Nevertheless <WH2094>, if thou warn the wicked <WH7563> of his way <WH1870> to turn <WH7725> from it <WH7725>, and he turn not from his way <WH1870>; he shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity <WH5771>, but thou hast delivered <WH5337> thy soul <WH5315>.

And thou <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, say <WH559> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>: Thus ye speak <WH559>, saying <WH559>, Our transgressions <WH6588> and our sins <WH2403> are upon us <WH4743>, and we pine away in them <WH2421>; how then can we live?

Say <WH559> unto them <WH2416>, As I live, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, I have no pleasure <WH2654> in the death <WH4194> of the wicked <WH7563>; but that the wicked <WH7563> turn <WH7725> from his way <WH1870> and live <WH2421>: turn <WH7725> ye <WH7725>, turn ye from your evil <WH7451> ways <WH1870>; for why will ye die <WH4191>, O house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>?

And thou <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, say <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971>, The righteousness <WH6666> of the righteous <WH6662> shall not deliver <WH5337> him in the day <WH3117> of his transgression <WH6588>; and as for the wickedness <WH7564> of the wicked <WH7563>, he shall not fall <WH3782> thereby in the day <WH3117> that he turneth <WH7725> from his wickedness <WH7562>; neither shall he that is righteous <WH6662> be able <WH3201> to live <WH2421> thereby in the day <WH3117> that he sinneth <WH2398>.

When I say <WH559> to the righteous <WH6662>, that he shall surely <WH2421> live <WH2421>; if he trust <WH982> to his righteousness <WH6666>, and commit <WH6213> iniquity <WH5766>, none of his righteous <WH6666> deeds shall be remembered <WH2142>; but in his iniquity <WH5766> that he hath committed <WH6213>, therein shall he die <WH4191>.

Again <WH559>, when I say unto the wicked <WH7563>, Thou shalt surely <WH4191> die <WH4191>; if he turn <WH7725> from his sin <WH2403>, and do <WH6213> that which is lawful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>;

if the wicked <WH7563> restore <WH7725> the pledge <WH2258>, give again <WH7999> that which he had taken by robbery <WH1500>, walk <WH1980> in the statutes <WH2708> of life <WH2416>, committing <WH6213> no iniquity <WH5766>; he shall surely <WH2421> live <WH2421>, he shall not die <WH4191>.

None of his sins <WH2403> that he hath committed <WH2398> shall be remembered <WH2142> against him <WH6213>: he hath done that which is lawful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>; he shall surely <WH2421> live <WH2421>.
Yet the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971> say <WH559>, The way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH136> is not equal <WH8505>: but as for them <WH1870>, their way is not equal <WH8505>.
When the righteous <WH6662> turneth <WH7725> from his righteousness <WH6666>, and committeth <WH6213> iniquity <WH5766>, he shall even die therein <WH4191>.
And when the wicked <WH7563> turneth <WH7725> from his wickedness <WH7564>, and doeth <WH6213> that which is lawful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>, he shall live thereby <WH2421>.
Yet ye say <WH559>, The way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH136> is not equal <WH8505>. O house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, I will judge <WH8199> you every one <WH376> after his ways <WH1870>.

And it came to pass in the twelfth <WH8147> year <WH8141> of our captivity <WH1546>, in the tenth <WH6224> month <WH2568>, in the fifth day of the month <WH2320>, that one that had escaped <WH6412> out of Jerusalem <WH3389> came <WH935> unto me <WH559>, saying, The city <WH5892> is smitten <WH5221>.

Now the hand <WH3027> of Jehovah <WH3068> had been upon me in the evening <WH6153>, before <WH6440> he that was escaped <WH6412> came <WH935>; and he had opened <WH6605> my mouth <WH6310>, until he came <WH935> to me in the morning <WH1242>; and my mouth <WH6310> was opened <WH6605>, and I was no more dumb <WH481>.
And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, they that inhabit <WH3427> those waste <WH2723> places in the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478> speak <WH559>, saying <WH559>, Abraham <WH85> was one <WH259>, and he inherited <WH3423> the land <WH776>: but we are many <WH7227>; the land <WH776> is given <WH5414> us for inheritance <WH4181>.

Wherefore say <WH559> unto them <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Ye eat <WH398> with the blood <WH1818>, and lift up <WH5375> your eyes <WH5869> unto your idols <WH1544>, and shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818>: and shall ye possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>?

Ye stand <WH5975> upon your sword <WH2719>, ye work <WH6213> abomination <WH8441>, and ye defile <WH2930> every one <WH376> his neighbor <WH7453>'s wife <WH802>: and shall ye possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>?

Thus shalt thou say <WH559> unto them <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: As I live <WH2416>, surely they that are in the waste <WH2723> places shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>; and him that is in the open <WH6440> field <WH7704> will I give <WH5414> to the beasts <WH2416> to be devoured <WH398>; and they that are in the strongholds <WH4679> and in the caves <WH4631> shall die <WH4191> of the pestilence <WH1698>.

And I will make <WH5414> the land <WH776> a desolation <WH8077> and an astonishment <WH8077>; and the pride <WH1347> of her power <WH5797> shall cease <WH7673>; and the mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478> shall be desolate <WH8074>, so that none shall pass through <WH5674>.

Then shall they know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>, when I have made <WH5414> the land <WH776> a desolation <WH8077> and an astonishment <WH8077>, because of all their abominations <WH8441> which they have committed <WH6213>.

And as for thee <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971> talk <WH1696> of <WH681> thee by the walls <WH7023> and in the doors <WH6607> of the houses <WH1004>, and speak <WH1696> one <WH2297> to another <WH259>, every one <WH376> to his brother <WH251>, saying <WH559>, Come <WH935>, I pray you <WH8085>, and hear what is the word <WH1697> that cometh forth <WH3318> from Jehovah <WH3068>.

And they come <WH935> unto thee as the people <WH5971> cometh <WH3996>, and they sit <WH3427> before <WH6440> thee as my people <WH5971>, and they hear <WH8085> thy words <WH1697>, but do <WH6213> them not <WH6310>; for with their mouth they show <WH6213> much love <WH5690>, but their heart <WH3820> goeth <WH1980> after <WH310> their gain <WH1215>.

And <WH5690>, lo, thou art unto them as a very lovely song <WH7892> of one that hath a pleasant <WH3303> voice <WH6963>, and can play well <WH2895> on an instrument <WH5059>; for they hear <WH8085> thy words <WH1697>, but they do them not <WH6213>.
And when this cometh to pass <WH935>, (behold <WH935>, it cometh,) then shall they know <WH3045> that a prophet <WH5030> hath been among them <WH8432>.
